task.title: How to wrap your code with the figure element
task.shortdesc: This document demonstrates how to wrap code within the figure element, and adding a caption to the code.

context.p: A few things needed to complete this task include:

ul.li: Decide on the piece of code that you want to add to the figure element.
Decide on how you want it to look like on the page.
Come up with a caption that describes the code.

step.cmd: Inside the figure element add the paragraph tag

substep.cmd: Inside the paragraph tag, add the code tag and write whatever you want the code to say
Close the code, and paragraph tags
Inside the figure element, add a figure caption describing what you just did. This caption should be outsie the paragraph and code tags, but inside the figure element.
